mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.notice_name as noticeName ,a.notice_photo as noticePhoto ,a.notice_types as noticeTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.notice_content as noticeContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM notice a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.notice_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.noticeName},'%')
and a.notice_types = #{params.noticeTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.notice_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.noticeContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
